Alternative 4: Glacier Express or Bernina Express Another option to see glaciers, mountains and the best that Swiss nature has to offer without visiting Jungfraujoch is on board a scenic train . I’ve written an extensive post about the Glacier Express and the Bernina Express here . They both a ccept all travel passes and might be a great way for you to see the best of Switzerland without heading to the Top of Europe. If you go for this option, please do yourself a favour and buy a travel pass. Riding the full Glacier Express from St. Moritz to Zermatt costs 152 CHF, which doesn’t include the compulsory reservation fee yet.
